text: Martin Luther McCoy is an American musician and actor. He worked with The Roots a lot and appears as one of the six lead characters in the 2007 Beatles musical Across the Universe in the role of "JoJo". McCoy goes by the stage name of "Martin Luther" in his music career. For his acting work, he is known under his full name. Martin Luther released his first solo album The Calling in 1999 and followed it with an independent release of his second album Rebel Soul Music in 2004, on his own label Rebel Soul Records. His third album Love is the Hero was supposed to be released in 2011 Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Musicians from San Francisco Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from San Francisco
title: Martin Luther McCoy
